item.title: About
item.description: I am interested in recording, understanding and simulating the natural world around us. I explore these interests through: Photography: I like recording and understanding natural phenomena (TODO LINK). At the same time, I am fascinated by how current camera technology works and enjoy exploring the limits of consumer-level budget cameras. Outdoor adventures: I enjoy hiking and biking. I feel most alive after overcoming difficult physical challenges. Researching simulation techniques: I work in Computer Graphics.
